## Project name
ABAC Drift

## Team members
- Kaung Khant Si Thu   6228104
- Kyaw Zin Thein 6228105
- Renatta Fernandez 6338017
 
## Project description

### Entities (Buyer, Seller & Motorcycle)
Buying and selling second-hand motorcycle platform. The sellers can list their motorcycles along with the necessary information. Buyers can see all the motorcycles and make an appointment on the date and time they want. Our first entity is the motorcycle information, including appointment details. The second entity is seller information and the third one is buyer information.
 
## Tech Stack
- Vue.js (front-end)
- Node.js (JS runtime environment)
- Mongo DB (database)
- Nuxt Nitro (backend)
- Supabase (User Authentication)


<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->

- [Nuxt 3](https://v3.nuxtjs.org)
- [TailwindCSS](https://tailwindcss.com/)
- [Headless UI](https://headlessui.com/)
- [Pinia](https://pinia.vuejs.org/)
- [VeeValidate V4](https://vee-validate.logaretm.com/v4/)
- [MongoDB](https://www.mongodb.com/)

## How to start

1. Add mongo uri to `.env` file
2. Install dependencies with `npm install --force` (Force if you get an error abot pinia)
3. Run dev with `npm run dev`
4. Build & deploy if you want to `npm run build`
